channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 俄罗斯选手安德烈-卢布列夫（Andrey Rublev）因涉嫌在周五的迪拜ATP比赛中对边线裁判使用猥亵语言而被取消比赛资格，亚历山大-布布里克（Alexander Bublik）因此获得决赛席位 #AFPSports
item.description:
Russia's Andrey Rublev was defaulted from the Dubai ATP tournament for allegedly using obscene language in an angry tirade at a line umpire on Friday, gifting Alexander Bublik a place in the final #AFPSports https://t.co/CzHBe2Bj3R pic.twitter.com/sLD3DXRyDh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京从未提到过阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的名字，但这位俄罗斯领导人在国内最重要的政治对手却成功地让克里姆林宫首脑耿耿于怀，不过他的影响力在他死后将如何持续还有待观察 @Stuart_JW
item.description:
Vladimir Putin never referred to Alexei Navalny by name yet the Russian leader's most significant domestic political opponent succeeded in haunting the Kremlin chief, though it remains to be seen how his influence will endure after his death @Stuart_JW https://t.co/skOblVnVPS pic.twitter.com/xtn9NO6xgL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: #马克龙赞扬俄罗斯人纪念纳瓦尔尼的 "勇气
item.description:
#BREAKING Macron hails 'courage' of Russians honoring Navalny pic.twitter.com/f7NeXrO8SC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 梅西和国际米兰将不会参加本赛季的美国公开赛，只有八家美国职业足球大联盟俱乐部参加淘汰赛。
item.description:
Lionel Messi and Inter Miami will not participate in the US Open Cup this season with just eight Major League Soccer clubs competing in the knockout competition, after a compromise deal between the league and the US Soccer Federation #AFPSports ⚽https://t.co/1nPboHJf8v

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 周五，考古学家在发掘古罗马城市庞贝时，在新发现的几幅壁画中发现了一幅描绘神话场景的豪华油画。
item.description:
A lavish painting of a mythological scene was among several newly discovered frescoes revealed Friday by archaeologists excavating the ancient Roman city of Pompeiihttps://t.co/xBVWe466Dm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: #拜登称美国将开始向加沙空投人道主义物资
item.description:
#BREAKING Biden says US to begin humanitarian air drops in Gaza pic.twitter.com/3Idfg7sG4s

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 周五，红牛车队王牌车手马克斯-维斯塔潘在赛季揭幕战巴林大奖赛中夺得杆位，他对连续第四次夺得一级方程式世界冠军的追求由此开始 #AFPSports
item.description:
Max Verstappen's quest for a fourth consecutive Formula One world championship began in style on Friday with the Red Bull ace claiming pole for the season-opening Bahrain Grand Prix #AFPSports https://t.co/6EVjhwgSy3 pic.twitter.com/kepFsVKAGf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 凯特-温斯莱特在新政治讽刺剧《政权》中饰演一位独裁者，与她的个人恶魔打交道，制片人希望这部剧既 "有趣又可怕"。
item.description:
Kate Winslet stars as a dictator dealing with her personal demons in "The Regime", a new political satire whose makers hope it is "funny and awful" at the same timehttps://t.co/KO2DkSrr7K pic.twitter.com/PdWgaD1gIu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 新@法新社：关于定向能武器点燃野火的阴谋论本周再次出现，X网站上的造谣者毫无根据地将得克萨斯州潘汉德地区的大火归咎于激光--一些人歪曲了乔-拜登的话，以进一步证实这种说法。
item.description:
New @AFP:

Conspiracy theories about directed energy weapons igniting wildfires resurfaced this week as disinformers on X baselessly blamed lasers for the blazes in the Texas panhandle — with some misrepresenting Joe Biden's words to further the claims.https://t.co/IlJ8xHzPMR

— Bill McCarthy (@billdmccarthy) March 1, 2024

item.title: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）抨击了 TikTok 的人工智能方法，因为两家公司在歌曲版税问题上的争执不断升级，流行音乐被从社交媒体平台⬇️。
item.description:
Universal Music Group has lambasted TikTok's approach to AI as the feud between the two companies over song royalties escalates and popular music is expunged from the social media platform⬇️https://t.co/cZ7IGh0km0 pic.twitter.com/fz678Z20kL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 美国记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）因间谍罪在俄罗斯被捕近一年后，他的父母寄希望于美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）的一个 "非常私人 "的承诺，将他带回家。@mariasdanilova 报道
item.description:
Nearly a year since US journalist Evan Gershkovich was arrested in Russia on espionage charges, his parents are counting on a "very personal" promise from President Joe Biden to bring him home. Story by @mariasdanilova https://t.co/Cl4HuwMRbi pic.twitter.com/5KHZnxU3cA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 周五，数百人走上街头，在叙利亚叛军控制的西北部地区举行了罕见的抗议圣战统治者的活动。
item.description:
Hundreds took to the streets across Syria's rebel-held northwest on Friday in rare protests against its jihadist rulers, as anger simmered a week after a man died in their custody.https://t.co/905c0GEe7h

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 官员们周五表示，降雨为这场德克萨斯州历史上最大的野火提供了一些缓和，但预计本周末这场已造成两人死亡、100 万英亩土地被烧焦的大火将再次出现干燥、狂风大作的情况。
item.description:
Rainfall offered some reprieve from the largest wildfire in the history of Texas, officials said Friday, though dry, gusty conditions were expected to return this weekend for a blaze that has killed two people and scorched a million acres.https://t.co/YWWN6oJo8Z

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 瓜迪奥拉（Pep Guardiola）表示，尽管曼城将在周日的德比战中开局大胜曼联，但他仍期待曼联 "表现最好"。
item.description:
Pep Guardiola says he is expecting the "best" from Manchester United even though Manchester City will start Sunday's derby as red-hot favourites to extend their dominance over their rivals.#AFPSports https://t.co/41cRlvOJgA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：在伊拉克北部的萨拉赫丁省，一滩滩黑色的原油遍布地面，污染了大片农田。
item.description:
VIDEO: In the northern Salaheddine province of Iraq, puddles of black crude oil dot the ground, contaminating vast swathes of farmland. pic.twitter.com/n0Svk1TMnm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对他在 2015 年帮助成立的人工智能公司 OpenAI 提起了诉讼，指责该公司的领导人 "背叛 "了公司的创始使命。
item.description:
Elon Musk has launched a legal case against OpenAI, the AI firm he helped to set up in 2015, accusing its leaders of a "betrayal" of its founding mission.https://t.co/BH67PprCGM pic.twitter.com/fER0EcXB46

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 伦敦地铁网络正在举行自大流行病以来的首次巴士艺人试演，为该市每天 350 万名乘客带来娱乐和欢乐
item.description:
The London Underground network is holding its first auditions since the pandemic for buskers to keep the city's 3.5 million daily travellers entertained and uplifted https://t.co/HvsvnnVZKv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 司法消息人士周五表示，西班牙检方将对前巴西国脚丹尼-阿尔维斯（Dani Alves）因强奸罪被判处四年半监禁的判决提出上诉，并寻求更长的刑期。
item.description:
Spanish prosecutors will appeal against the four-and-a-half year sentence handed to former Brazil international footballer Dani Alves for rape and seek a longer jail term, judicial sources said Friday.https://t.co/QNiIq13Gah

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 一位法国部长周五表示，2023 年秋天法国因臭虫传播而引起的恐慌是由于与俄罗斯国家有关的社交媒体账户上的虚假信息造成的。
item.description:
The panic that gripped France in autumn 2023 over the alleged spread of bed bugs was amplified by disinformation on social media accounts linked to the Russian state, a French minister said Friday.https://t.co/z2nyVkW67d

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：暴雨过后，士兵和救援志愿者在玻利维亚首都拉巴斯的一条河流中努力防止洪水泛滥。
item.description:
VIDEO: Soldiers and rescue volunteers work to prevent flooding in a river in Bolivia's capital La Paz after heavy downpours. pic.twitter.com/3Ywf9JmUpv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 瓜迪奥拉（Pep Guardiola）表示，尽管曼城将在周日的德比战中开局大胜曼联，但他仍期待曼联 "表现最好"。
item.description:
Pep Guardiola says he is expecting the "best" from Manchester United even though Manchester City will start Sunday's derby as red-hot favourites to extend their dominance over their rivals.#AFPSports https://t.co/41cRlvPh68

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 佳士得拍卖行称，从眼镜到班克斯（Banksy）的三联画，属于埃尔顿-约翰的 900 多件物品和艺术品收藏在本月的几次拍卖会上拍出了 2,000 多万美元的高价。
item.description:
From glasses to a Banksy triptych, a collection of more than 900 items and artworks belonging to Elton John fetched more than $20 million at several auctions this month, Christie's says https://t.co/pkX238WTtA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 埃迪-豪周五表示，他在陷入困境的纽卡斯尔的未来掌握在自己手中，同时他撇清了德国队主教练朱利安-纳格尔斯曼（Julian Nagelsmann）与他的工作有关的报道。
item.description:
Eddie Howe said Friday his future at struggling Newcastle was in his own hands as he brushed off reports linking Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann with his job.#AFPSports https://t.co/1g23UT3Tfq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 伊朗人周五投票选举议会和一个重要的神职机构，人们担心投票率会很低，保守派预计会加强对权力的控制。
item.description:
Iranians voted on Friday in elections for parliament and a key clerical body, amid fears of a low turnout and with conservatives expected to tighten their grip on power.https://t.co/aRpWdoyXGp

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 周五，爱尔兰在阿布扎比以六个小门的优势击败阿富汗，终于赢得了他们的首场测试赛，结束了七连败。
item.description:
Ireland finally won their first Test match on Friday when they defeated Afghanistan by six wickets in Abu Dhabi, ending a streak of seven successive losses.#AFPSports https://t.co/BKBg0UAdBk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：雄伟的东京市政府总部大楼现在是世界上最大的永久性投影地图显示屏的所在地。
item.description:
VIDEO: The imposing towers of Tokyo's city government headquarters are now home to the world's largest permanent projection mapping display. pic.twitter.com/g0hA0mUA83

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 红牛车队负责人克里斯蒂安-霍纳（Christian Horner）周五再次承受压力，因为据称他与一名女性工作人员之间的私人信息被泄露给了一级方程式赛车官员和记者。
item.description:
Red Bull team principal Christian Horner was under renewed pressure on Friday after private messages allegedly between him and a female staff member were leaked to Formula One officials and journalists.#AFPSports https://t.co/dzWxASUGjq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 周五，在孟加拉国最大医院的停尸房外，悲痛欲绝的家属们守候在那里，等待亲人的遗体得到确认。
item.description:
Anguished families kept vigil outside the morgue of Bangladesh's largest hospital on Friday, waiting for the bodies of loved ones to be identified after a fire they say should never have happened.https://t.co/fM4cBsjm91

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：澳大利亚极北地区的保护工作帮助咸水掠食者从濒临灭绝的边缘挣扎回来，这项独特的计划让有鳞掠食者与澳大利亚北领地的当地人共存。
item.description:
VIDEO: Conservation efforts in Australia's far north are credited with helping wrestle the saltwater predators back from the verge of extinction, with a unique program that allow the scaly predators to coexist with the locals in Australia's Northern Territory. pic.twitter.com/easdbgfx7m

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：得克萨斯州正在扑灭其历史上最大的野火。这场大火已造成至少两人死亡，烧毁了美国南部一百万英亩的土地。#AFPVertical📸 🎥 格林维尔消防救援队/FacebookFlower Mound 消防队
item.description:
VIDEO: Texas is battling the largest wildfire in its history. The blaze has killed at least two people and scorched a million acres in the southern US state. #AFPVertical
📸 🎥 Greenville Fire Rescue/Facebook
Flower Mound Fire Department pic.twitter.com/i5L2BNWby9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024
